TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class FileWebRequest Inherits WebRequest Implements ISerializable
type FileWebRequest = class inherit WebRequest interface ISerializable

summary.span: 提供 类的文件系统实现。

span.span: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现统一资源标识符（Uri）的 `abstract` 基类，使用 `file://` 方案来请求本地文件。The class implements the `abstract` base class for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that use the `file://` scheme to request local files. 不要使用 构造函数。Do not use the constructor. 使用 方法初始化 类的新实例。Use the method to initialize new instances of the class. 如果 `file://`URI 方案，则 方法返回 对象。If the URI scheme is `file://`, the method returns a object. 方法对 属性中指定的文件进行同步请求，并返回包含响应的 对象。The method makes a synchronous request for the file specified in the property and returns a object that contains the response. 您可以使用 和 方法对文件进行异步请求。You can make an asynchronous request for the file using the and methods. 当要将数据写入文件时， 方法返回要写入的 实例。When you want to write data to a file, the method returns a instance to write to. 和 方法提供对写入数据流的异步访问。The and methods provide asynchronous access to the write data stream. 类依赖于 类来实现错误处理和代码访问安全性。The class relies on the class for error handling and code access security. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 类来访问文件系统资源。The following code example uses the class to access a file system resource. [!code-cpp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CPP/getrequeststream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CS/getrequeststream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/VB/getrequeststream.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消向 Internet 资源发出的请求。

span.span: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消对资源的请求。The method cancels a request to a resource. 取消请求后，调用 、、、、或 方法将导致 属性设置为 的 。After a request is canceled, calling the , , , , , or method causes a with the property set to . **注意**当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将输出跟踪信息。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将启动一个用于将数据发送到文件系统资源的流的异步请求。The method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data to a file system resource. 实现 委托的回调方法使用 方法返回请求流。The callback method that implements the delegate uses the method to return the request stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 对 对象发出异步请求。The following code example uses to make an asynchronous request for a object. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类不会对本地文件系统中的文件请求进行身份验证，因此将忽略 属性的内容（如果有）。Because the class does not authenticate requests for files from the local file system, it ignores the contents, if any, of the property. 的身份验证由基础文件系统中文件资源的访问控制列表进行处理。Authentication for is handled by the access control lists for the file resource in the underlying file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成 方法启动的异步流请求。The method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免垃圾回收的计时问题，请确保在调用 方法后，通过对 方法返回的流调用 方法来关闭响应流。To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the method on the stream returned by the method after calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来结束对 对象的异步请求。The following example uses the method to end the asynchronous request for a object. [!code-cpp[FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd/CPP/filewebrequest_reqbeginend.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd/CS/filewebrequest_reqbeginend.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FileWebRequest_ReqBeginEnd/VB/filewebrequest_reqbeginend.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置请求超时前的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time until the request times out.

value.span: 请求超时前的时间长度（以毫秒为单位），或是值 以指示请求不超时。

span.span: The time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value to indicate that the request does not time out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 域名系统（DNS）查询可能需要长达15秒钟的时间来返回或超时。如果你的请求中包含需要解析的主机名，并且你将 设置为小于15秒的值，则可能需要15秒或更长时间，然后才会引发 来指示请求超时。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 属性。The following code example sets the property. 请参阅 类中的完整示例。Refer to the complete example in the class.
